alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Lee; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lee, northeastern Clarendon and central Sumter Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 322 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sardis to near Hebron to near Alcolu. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sumter, Manning, South Sumter, Mulberry, Alcolu, Woods Bay State Park, Millwood, Turbeville, Mayesville, Lynchburg, Brogdon, Lakewood, East Sumter, Gable and Shiloh. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 118 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
